item.description:
I will be at the theater by 6:30. We should head in for seats by 7. Showtime is 7:40.

Finally...a sci fi action flick! Yeah!

7PM is only an estimate, I will update it closer to the event.

Movie Details:

Release Date: November 12, 2010
Studio: Universal Pictures
Director: Greg Strause, Colin Strause
Screenwriter: Joshua Cordes, Liam O'Donnell
Starring: Eric Balfour, Donald Faison, Scottie Thompson, Brittany Daniel
Genre: Sci-Fi, Thriller
MPAA Rating: Not Available
Official Website:

http://www.iamrogue.c...

Plot Summary: In the sci-fi thriller "Skyline," strange lights descend on the city of Los Angeles, drawing people outside like moths to a flame where an extraterrestrial force threatens to swallow the entire human population off the face of the earth.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a Boston Meetup Badge. If movie is upstairs, I will snag a table at the top of the escalator, if it is downstairs, I will be near the ropes by the concession stand.
item.name: Skyline
